00049 #define SS0(x) ((s_s0[x]*0x01010101UL) & 0x3FCFF3FC)
00050 #define SS1(x) ((s_s1[x]*0x01010101UL) & 0xFC3FCFF3)
00051 #define SS2(x) ((s_s0[x]*0x01010101UL) & 0xF3FC3FCF)
00052 #define SS3(x) ((s_s1[x]*0x01010101UL) & 0xCFF3FC3F)
00053 #define G(x) (SS0(GETBYTE(x, 0)) ^ SS1(GETBYTE(x, 1)) ^ SS2(GETBYTE(x, 2)) ^ SS3(GETBYTE(x, 3)))
00054 
00055 void SEED::Base::UncheckedSetKey(const byte *userKey, unsigned int length, const NameValuePairs &params)
00056 {
00057         AssertValidKeyLength(length);
00058 
00059         word64 key01, key23;
00060         GetBlock<word64, BigEndian> get(userKey);
00061         get(key01)(key23);
00062         word32 *k = m_k;
00063         size_t kInc = 2;
00064         if (!IsForwardTransformation())
00065         {
00066                 k = k+30;
00067                 kInc = 0-kInc;
00068         }
00069 
00070         for (int i=0; i<ROUNDS; i++)
00071         {
00072                 word32 t0 = word32(key01>>32) + word32(key23>>32) - s_kc[i];
00073                 word32 t1 = word32(key01) - word32(key23) + s_kc[i];
00074                 k[0] = G(t0);
00075                 k[1] = G(t1);
00076                 k+=kInc;
00077                 if (i&1)
00078                         key23 = rotlFixed<word64>(key23, 8);
00079                 else
00080                         key01 = rotrFixed<word64>(key01, 8);
00081         }
00082 }
00083 
00084 void SEED::Base::ProcessAndXorBlock(const byte *inBlock, const byte *xorBlock, byte *outBlock) const
00085 {
00086         typedef BlockGetAndPut<word32, BigEndian> Block;
00087         word32 a0, a1, b0, b1, t0, t1;
00088         Block::Get(inBlock)(a0)(a1)(b0)(b1);
00089 
00090         for (int i=0; i<ROUNDS; i+=2)
00091         {
00092                 t0 = b0 ^ m_k[2*i+0]; t1 = b1 ^ m_k[2*i+1] ^ t0;
00093                 t1 = G(t1); t0 += t1; t0 = G(t0); t1 += t0; t1 = G(t1);
00094                 a0 ^= t0 + t1; a1 ^= t1;
00095 
00096                 t0 = a0 ^ m_k[2*i+2]; t1 = a1 ^ m_k[2*i+3] ^ t0;
00097                 t1 = G(t1); t0 += t1; t0 = G(t0); t1 += t0; t1 = G(t1);
00098                 b0 ^= t0 + t1; b1 ^= t1;
00099         }
00100 
00101         Block::Put(xorBlock, outBlock)(b0)(b1)(a0)(a1);
00102 }
